.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

point_fitting
=============

The point_fitting module contains functions used in localizing single
particles. for more info see the
`fitting gaussians <https://github.com/ReddingLab/Learning/blob/master/image-analysis-basics/fitting-gaussians.ipynb/>`_
or the
`finding local maxima <https://github.com/ReddingLab/Learning/blob/master/image-analysis-basics/finding-local-maxima.ipynb/>`_
tutorials.


The point_fitting module
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
.. automodule:: point_fitting
   :members:
